pilots.name: Zorii Bliss

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: After a ship at range 1 performs an action during its Perform Action step, if that action is on your action bar, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform that action, treating it as red.
pilots.caption: Corsair of Kijimi

pilots.name: Teza Nasz

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs an attack, if the defender has a ship friendly to the attacker in each of its side arcs ([Left Arc] and [Right Arc]), the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.
pilots.caption: Old Soldier

pilots.name: Wilsa Teshlo

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, if the defender was dealt a faceup damage card, the defender gains 1 strain token unless it chooses 1 non-recurring [Charge] from 1 of its equipped upgrades and loses that [Charge].
pilots.caption: Veiled Sorority Privateer

pilots.name: Shasa Zaro

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: After you defend, you may choose a friendly ship in your [Full Rear Arc] at range 0-2 and 1 of your green tokens. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.
pilots.caption: Artistic Ace

pilots.name: Lega Fossang

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: While you perform a primary or [Turret] attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each friendly device or calculating friendly ship in the attack arc.
pilots.caption: Hero of Humbarine

pilots.name: Aftab Ackbar

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: After you execute a red basic maneuver or perform a red action, if you have exactly 1 stress token, you may gain 1 strain token to remove that stress token.
pilots.caption: “Junior”

pilots.name: Corus Kapellim

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: Before you engage, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0-1. If you do, transfer 1 green token from that ship to yourself.
pilots.caption: “Gentleman Flyer”

pilots.name: C’ai Threnalli

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through a friendly ship, you may perform an [Evade] action.
pilots.caption: Tenacious Survivor

pilots.name: New Republic Patrol

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.text: Designed for customization, the BTA-NR2 Y-wing is used by numerous military organizations across the galaxy in a variety of roles, from law enforcement craft to wartime bombers.

pilots.name: Kijimi Spice Runner

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Interface
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action added to your action bar by a [Talent], [Illicit], or [Modification] upgrade, you may perform a [Calculate] action.

pilots.text: Led by Zorii Bliss, the Kijimi Spice Runners set aside their usual mercenary ways to take the fight to the Final Order at the Battle of Exegol.
